metadata.Title: CVE-2022-20495 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description: In getEnabledAccessibilityServiceList of AccessibilityManager.java, thereis a possible way to hide an accessibility service due to a logic error inthe code. This could lead to local escalation of privilege with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.Product: AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12Android-12L Android-13Android ID: A-243849844

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
